alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Huerfano and central Las Animas Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 628 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Walsenburg to 6 miles northeast of Aguilar. Movement was east at 25 mph. A Flash Flood Warning remains in effect for the area. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Huerfano and central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
